body: For each replicate, start with 1 ml serum or plasma.
Bring up volume to fill ultracentrifuge tube with PBS.
Centrifuge for 90 min at 100,000 x g at 4°C.
Discard supernatant and resuspend pellet in PBS to fill ultracentrifuge tube.
Centrifuge for 70 min at 100,000 x g at 4°C.
Proceed to miRNeasy RNA isolation by adding 1 mL Qiazol to pellet.
